citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1050-1120 on
27-Jul-17.
All gates to the property were closed. The inspector called and left a message on the voice mail and waited outside
the property for approximately 30 minutes.
